attributes.comment:
Dear Government Representative,
Regarding U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services, docket # (USCIS-2006-
0044) - please skip this unreasonable fee increase! At a minimum, please skip
this increase for adopting families. My family is in the process of bringing home a
second orphan. We've already had to pay the astronomical USCIS fees 3 times
because the approvals only last for about 18 months. Fingerprinting we've paid for
4 times because they last only about a year. We've been examined, studied,
fingerprinted, reviewed and qualified by numerous agencies. To have to submit to
USCIS all of this information, plus pay huge fees multiple times is
unconscionable. And to raise the fees yet again is just too much. I am a tax
paying American citizen bringing into the country a bright child who will also be a
taxpayer. Let's make the fees reasonable for people following the rules.

Sincerely,
Jackie Chang

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jackie Chang
